comments.comment: Bjorn barfing when asked a question already shows that he knows how comedic timing works, what a chad
Pewds calling us a baby while holding a baby is very gigachad.

Pewds: "I am supreme leader."
Me: "I accept without question."
So is Björn going to learn Swedish, Italian, English and Japanese? He'll be too powerful
Pewds went from "Never have kids, guys." to "Being a Dad is awesome."
Behind the sarcasm and great humor, Pewds has rock solid advice I've never heard before. The intrusive thoughts trick is amazing.
Pewds went from a guy that plays games is funny to giving advice better than most so called 'self development' youtubers.
I agree with Bjorn, truly unacceptable.

Bjorn is so disappointed he barfs in disgust
I agree with Bjorn, truly unacceptable
Since pewds is now a dad, we now deserve dad jokes
Bjorn puking when you ask him a question is honestly a mood.
It’s mad to think I was just 9 years old watching felix now I’m a 20 year old man. It feels like I grew up with him and the fact he’s a dad and married in this time is crazy and I love it for him

I really like when Felix does videos like this. Honestly he could be talking about anything and I'd probably enjoy it, but these videos always give me things to consider in my own life and how I could help myself more.  And they are just really chill videos to watch and make me happy. It's incredible how well Felix and Marzia are doing and how happy they are.

I love this point in life for Felix. Love the advice he gives, love how he promotes exercise and reading so casually and especially how he talks about just deciding to be happy. So inspirational. His growth is clear and I hope to be able to follow in his footsteps.

it kind of made me emotional hearing they sat down as a couple and considered what they’d be willing to sacrifice for their baby, Idk I feel like many parents don’t have those kinds of considerations and it leads to  resentment towards their kids  some people are so immature like that…it’s just nice seeing how responsible you guys are

14:42 
I always love how you fondly talk about graphic design, because that's how I found your channel! I remember being in high school (like 2014) barely learning about Photoshop and this guy in my class told me you did Photoshop videos! Even now seeing your merch and branding is just so cool to me! It's feels like your designer and artistic self is still alive and kicking!  
Marzia is also super artistic and both your styles are so different but the contrast between the two of you is so fun! 
Love you guys lots! x
bjorn puking the moment the camera is on him is a certified Bjorn moment of all time
As a person who breathes, this is truly breathtaking.
from a man child ,to a man, to a man having a child , pewds sure has evolved

Some of the mentalities you mentioned, like being confident as a kid, being crazy at your hobby, are somehow forgotten as I grew older. I thought exactly like you when I was younger. But life hits hard and comes at you fast. And all of a sudden I am now 28 and I found myself caught up in struggles and self-doubts. And these thoughts that I had just eventually vanished. Now that you mentioned it, I felt empowered again. Thanks for that pewds. Been watching your vids for 10+ years now. Wish you and your family all the best.
Björn throwing up while Pewds is telling us the shaker is sold out is peak advertisement
10:45 Björn just casually being funnier than 90% of prank channels
This is quite honestly amazing, I remember watching you scream your lungs out playing amnesia and now you are a dad giving advice.
2:46 to 4:07 is actually some amazing advice. I had learned that myself a few years back and it helps you progress your life so much better.

15:06 Him saying "if you haven't gotten that, you're doing great, don't worry, you'll be fine." Somehow hit me, I'm tearing up  damn in hindsight I know everyone struggles with confidence but not having people around you that can reassure you really sucks. It's been like more than 5 years since I've heard you're going to be ok in a non condescending way.

I cried at the end of this video. Felix has come soo far. This video was like a Therapy for me. I'm studying for my medical exams and it's really rough sometimes and yesterday was a pretty bad day for me, and today I watched this video and hearing Felix talk about self confidence and all that was really inspiring to keep me going. THANK YOU PEWDS
from a grown child to a man to a daddy. best channel ever.
10:50 he answered you with action
Pewds went from a friend, a father-figure for raising us, an actual dad, and now a sage who gives us ALL. Just everything
Pewds having to take care of an army of children while owning a personal child of his own, how inspiring.️

As a parent of a 4, almost 5 year old, seeing the world through their eyes will be so fulfilling and endearing in such a deeply spiritual way. Watching my daughter grow and discover the world, and herself, and helping her to do so has been the most rewarding thing in my entire life and I can't wait for you and Marzia to experience the same with baby Bjorn
Whenever he talks about working out, I always feel so inspired. I am tired of “work out to look good” energy and I love hearing someone focusing on the feel and mental health benefits it can have.

As a fellow young dad, it's amazing how similar our thoughts appear to be. That "make the choice" thing, in particular, is something I decided to do when my son was born.

There's something powerful in having to decide to be better than you are, because you have to raise your children well

Thank you so much for existing pewds! Life hasn’t been very nice to me this past month. Moving to a new country, loosing someone special and being homesick are some of the things that have not allowed me to feel happy. 

Listening to you and watching your videos is probably the best part of my day and you keep me going. Thanks again and I pray that you, Marzia, Bjorn and the doggos will always be healthy and happy!
Some people think he's a joke but to this day pewds was basically the biggest influence in my life and these words helped me  and didn't even realize I needed them. Thanks man
4:05 i can tell Pewds is trully happy cuz i never saw that happy face in my life on tons of his videos. much love to all you felix, marzia, bjorn and the dogs! best family on youtube!
He is truly a supreme leader.

If there is any famous person who should genuinely be looked up to its Felix, he has made mistakes and learned from them, done countless good things for others, and has matured like a fine wine yet without losing himself along the way. He's beaten the game life at this point and has gone into his farewell era
Bjorn’s comedic timing is impeccable! Really got it from Felix

i don’t talk about this on social media but this video warmed my heart, a took the anxiety out of me; but my older brother passed away almost a year ago nov 22nd to be precise… but Felix he loved your videos growing up and showed me you he was 20 when he passed last year, and i’m 20 now and have so many questions about life and this video alone answered just about all of them. thank you for creating, thank you for being you 100% of the time you’re the man.

also congratulations to you and Marzia !
"be the person who sees someone else" the most eye opening and heart warming words I've ever heard today

funny you said that everyone hated my history teacher but i loved him. i was always put in the “dumb class” i was so left behind in everything. he wouldn’t put up with any bullshit and i was so excited to learn. history is still my favourite thing to learn about all thanks to him not being defeated by chaotic teenagers. idk why watching this got me thinking i’m hoping i’ll be able to write him a letter to the school
Pewds is back when we needed him
bro just seems so happy, its fun to hear him talk about his outlook on life. gg pewds seems like you won the game life.

Maybe its because I watch Felix for so long but it means so much for me when he said that Im doing great and Ill be fine. Have tears in my eyes. How much can one person affect you when you never met him. Thank you Felix :)
the baby awkward reaction is literally me it was so freakin adorable. I've never been so captivated by an sponser before. Felix was like a father to me.
I love that Bjorn is now the sponsor partner  Edgar is probably furious

felix really is the man we should aspire to be. He found a beautiful woman, and has awesome doggos and Bjorn! He takes care of himself and his family and is always improving himself but stays goofy. mad respect.

Some of the advice here about choosing to be happy and consciously valuing working out and choosing that value actively every day was very good advice that I'm trying to incorporate into my own life now. Thank you Felix for always being there, and enjoy your first steps into fatherhood.

Honestly, for real, helping other people often helps me climb out of the pit of despair, even if it's for a while. Excellent advice Pewds

I'm really having trouble with being consistent with goals. What Felix said from 8:37 - 9:34 with his examples really hit me. I'm going to start being a little crazy with my goals from now on. Thank you Felix!

I started watching pewdiepie back in 2012 and it was after high school and it was a very depressing era of my life and here I am 11 years later being a dad as well seeing pewdiepie as dad gives me so much joy having him part of my life.
absolute therapy. i’d love to see more substantial content on the channel now that pewds can do whatever he wants

I like the part where he mentioned that happiness at the end of the day is a choice because things will never drastically change and even if they do, without internal reflection, you will not be able to see the change and appreciate it.

Summing up to say that “happiness is a decision and not a destination”

your advice on happiness honestly is so life-changing, and something i needed to hear in this moment. your advice too on consistency and intrusive thoughts, even the small advice for romance helps me and i'll take it into account. thank you for making this epic video, supreme leader (lol). take care to you and your family !! This felt like a talk with an old friend! Thanks pewds for your videos!
Dad Pewds is my favorite era in this channel. Loving it
Pewdiepie always be giving us the best life advice
PewDiePie never disappoints
As someone who grew up without a dad, pweds words really helped and gave me comfort. Thank you for that :)

Felix, I clicked on your video to watch something funny to get my mind off some things because I've been going through a slump filled with self-doubt, being unsure of myself, sadness and worrying about what other people are feeling while trying so hard to at the same time try to voice out my needs and it's a mess. 

I was so shocked to hear your advice in this video and it's so concise, simple and sincere. And it makes sense. I hope that I'd feel better, more relaxed, get my energy up again after trying out the advice you have given (along with other self-reflective thoughts and advice from other friends/family). 

I loved your content a lot and throughout the years I always thought you were a great person to listen to, and watch both for entertainment and for some self-reflection. 

This video came at a very right time for me, addressing what I was struggling with. Thank you so much!

5:04 something that I keep in my heart that my therapist has said about love is that... falling in love hurts because falling hurts but if you change the word with growing in love it makes the connection between you and your partner stronger. This is kind of stupid but I really like saying I'm growing with my partner and that we are helping each other grow as people and growing as one!!! (I hope this helps some people)

This video is amazing, the advice Pewds gave was actually pretty good. Can't believe this is the same guy from 2017, brought a tear from my eyes

15:33 is what I was going to comment. Really good advice because you get to see what other people are going through and how can you help them, which will end up realizing what can help you, plus helping someone else will make you less selfish, more empathetic, grow as a person, and feel good about helping someone that wasn't yourself. Be there for someone, the person they could rely on (it's normally not easy, and try that it's never about money, but advice, confidence, planning, etc).
